parameters.description: Choosing PLAN in wizard again will allow to display customized from to provide required parameters.

database_id.description:
SAP HANA Cloud Database must have added instance mapping to:
  • Standard Model:
    • CF organization GUID: 4454eff3-7c16-4106-adbf-debdd07da496

Instance mapping is only available for instances hosted in the same BTP region (ap10).
